description: Source code for a custom web component 'todo-list' that manages a list of todo items, including adding, removing, toggling, and updating item views.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: Custom web component class extending HTMLElement to manage a todo list with add, remove, toggle, and update functionalities.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new TodoItem to the list based on the provided entry object.

methods.name: addItems
methods.description: Adds multiple todo items from an array of entries.

methods.name: removeCompletedItems
methods.description: Removes all items marked as completed from the list.

methods.name: toggleItems
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of all items based on the 'completed' parameter.

methods.name: updateStyles
methods.description: Updates the display style of the list based on the total number of items.

methods.name: updateView
methods.description: Updates the visibility of an individual item based on the current route ('completed', 'active', or default).

methods.name: updateElements
methods.description: Updates the list of elements based on the specified action type and id.

methods.name: updateRoute
methods.description: Sets the current route and updates the view accordingly.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles changes to observed attributes and updates styles if connected.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when the component is added to the DOM; initializes styles.
